title: Simulation-Based Training Program for Improving Mobile Library User Experience

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage and library utilization experience
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields learn to effectively utilize library services in mobile learning environments through simulations and VR experiences

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the system quality (stability, speed), interaction quality (user feedback incorporation), content quality (resource diversity), interface quality (readability), and functional quality (search efficiency) of a mobile library app.
Learners can analyze user experience issues (e.g., search inconvenience, interface errors) in mobile learning environments through VR simulations and propose improvements.
Learners can collect and analyze real user feedback to design a service improvement model for enhancing the user experience of a mobile library app.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
